name: Linkee
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: linkee
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Linkee is a super-simple, shout-out-the-link trivia game. You get four clues and have to work out what links the four answers. So, if the answers to the clues were John, Paul, George and Ringo, the link would be… The Beatles. Each day you'll get a new 'Linkee of the Day' to play. To solve a Linkee, shout “Linkee!” after each clue for a chance to guess the link. There is also a final 'hint' at the end if you need it!

If you get the link right after the first clue, not only are you clearly a Linkee Ninja, but you'll win the maximum 10 points. The points drop after each attempt, so if you need four clues to guess the link, you'll only win four points. If you fail to guess the link after the final 'hint', then it's nil points for you. Chin up. Collect points each time you play to compete on the global leader board!

⭐Limitless Linkee⭐
Don't want to wait until tomorrow for your next 'Linkee?'
Subscribe to Limitless Linkee to play as many games as you want and race up the global leader board to become the Linkee Champion!

To play just say: “Alexa, open Linkee!”

Here are some things you can say!
'Alexa, open Linkee'
'Repeat Clue'
'Linkee!'


⭐Yak Yak Games Unlimited⭐
Linkee is part of Yak Yak Games, you can subscribe to get unlimited access to all our amazing questions, as well as access to premium features in Deal or No Deal, Yak Yak Quiz, Song Blast, 100K Drop, Jeff Stelling's Sports Quiz, What Came First? and Voice Blast! To get started, simply say: 'Alexa, open Linkee'.
